articles.author: Phil Casey
articles.title: Rory McIlroy reveals why Padraig Harrington is playing the numbers game to inspire Europe to Ryder Cup glory - Independent.ie
articles.description: Europe’s players will take inspiration from a stirring reminder of their place in Ryder Cup history as they bid to defy the odds and retain the trophy at Whistling Straits.
articles.content:

articles.title: 2020 Ryder Cup: The significance of the numbers on Team Europe's Ryder Cup golf bags - Golf Channel
articles.description: Stitched on the golf bags of all 12 of Padraig Harrington’s players this week at Whistling Straits is a number.
articles.content:
Analytics have become an increasingly important part of the entire Ryder Cup process, but European captain Padraig Harrington is taking his numbers game to a new level literally.
